title: National want list T200 Yankees/Americans SGC number grade
author: marvymelvin

posts.post_title: National want list T200 Yankees/Americans SGC number grade
posts.post_content:
Hey all of you lucky people at the national. I am wondering if you could look out for me for an SGC graded T200 NY Americans/Yankees. Thanks so much. I could also use a T222 Chance upgrade. Mine is ungraded/trimmed and I would like an SGC graded one.

PM if you find anything.
